dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, big news out of Kazakhstan, right? We just saw President Tokayev, like, officially bid farewell to President Xi Jinping.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, big news out of Kazakhstan, right? We just saw President Tokayev, like, officially bid farewell to President Xi Jinping.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev bid farewell to Chinese President Xi Jinping, according to Akorda.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, big news. President Tokayev, he just, um, warmly saw off President Xi at the airport. That's, uh, what Akorda reported.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, big news. President Tokayev, he just, um, warmly saw off President Xi at the airport. That's, uh, what Akorda reported.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev warmly said goodbye to President of the People's Republic of China Xi Jinping at the capitalâ„¢s airport, the statement from Akorda reads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right, right. A really warm goodbye, apparently. And, you know, it makes sense, 'cause Xi was there for a bit, wasn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, right. A really warm goodbye, apparently. And, you know, it makes sense, 'cause Xi was there for a bit, wasn't he?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, he was. A two-day visit, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, he was. A two-day visit, actually.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, President Xi Jinping arrived in Astana for a two-day visit at the invitation of President Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, okay. [interrupts] So, like, a quick but important trip then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, okay. So, like, a quick but important trip then.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. And, uh, it was at Tokayev's invitation, which is, you know, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. And, uh, it was at Tokayev's invitation, which is, you know, pretty significant.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a reminder, President Xi Jinping arrived in Astana for a two-day visit at the invitation of President Tokayev.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Ah, so a pretty formal invitation. What did they, like, talk about, mainly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ah, so a pretty formal invitation. What did they, like, talk about, mainly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the main thing was, um, deepening their comprehensive strategic partnership.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the main thing was, um, deepening their comprehensive strategic partnership.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: During the talks, the sides discussed the further deepening of the comprehensive strategic partnership between Kazakhstan and China.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right. So, you know, building on that relationship. Uh, Tokayev had some pretty strong words, didn't he?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right. So, you know, building on that relationship. Uh, Tokayev had some pretty strong words, didn't he?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: He really did. He said President Xi is always, quote, "a highly respected guest" on Kazakh soil.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He really did. He said President Xi is always, quote, a highly respected guest on Kazakh soil.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev emphasized that the Chinese President is always a highly respected guest on Kazakh soil, and his visit is a vivid symbol of the sincere and unwavering friendship between the two countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, wow. "Highly respected." That's, like, a very strong statement to make publicly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, wow. Highly respected. That's, like, a very strong statement to make publicly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And he called the visit, uh, a vivid symbol of "sincere and unwavering friendship" between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And he called the visit, uh, a vivid symbol of sincere and unwavering friendship between the two countries.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Tokayev emphasized that the Chinese President is always a highly respected guest on Kazakh soil, and his visit is a vivid symbol of the sincere and unwavering friendship between the two countries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Sincere and unwavering. I mean, that really underscores the bond, doesn't it?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Sincere and unwavering. I mean, that really underscores the bond, doesn't it?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It really does. It just shows, um, you know, how important this relationship is for both countries going forward.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It really does. It just shows, um, you know, how important this relationship is for both countries going forward.

dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. A lot of weight in that farewell, then.
